data.title: Slovakia
data.meta_description: Law: The Act No. 18/2018 Coll. on Protection of Personal Data and on Amendments to certain Acts (only available in Slovak here) (the Act) and the General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679) (GDPR) Regulator: Office for Personal Data Protection of the Slovak Republic (ÚOOÚ)  Summary: The Act implemented the GDPR into Slovakia and entered into force on 25 May
data.text:
Law: The Act No. 18/2018 Coll. on Protection of Personal Data and on Amendments to certain Acts (only available in Slovak here) (the Act) and the General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679) (GDPR)

Regulator: Office for Personal Data Protection of the Slovak Republic (ÚOOÚ)
